common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/eticket/code/consume')
request.add_api_parameter("biz_type", "5107")
request.add_api_parameter("code", "f12csfds")
request.add_api_parameter("outer_id", "FO1fsdjhk123")
request.add_api_parameter("serial_num", "3451c641-a7da-4264-92cb-78a1f79392c3")
request.add_api_parameter("consume_num", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("store_id", "123456")
request.add_api_parameter("pos_id", "POS1")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/eticket/code/consume')
request.add_api_param('biz_type', '5107')
request.add_api_param('code', 'f12csfds')
request.add_api_param('outer_id', 'FO1fsdjhk123')
request.add_api_param('serial_num', '3451c641-a7da-4264-92cb-78a1f79392c3')
request.add_api_param('consume_num', '1')
request.add_api_param('store_id', '123456')
request.add_api_param('pos_id', 'POS1')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: The certificate not belongs to the seller
Can't distinguish the business type of this code
No matched certificate of the outerId
